question.short: Do COVID-19 vaccines prevent symptoms or death?
question.long: Do COVID-19 vaccines prevent symptoms or death?

description: Results from studies evaluating the impact of COVID-19 vaccines on symptoms or death.

no_consensus.description: The literature has not yet reached a consensus on the effects of COVID-19 vaccines on symptoms or death

no.description: The literature suggests that COVID-19 vaccines do not prevent symptoms or death

towards_no.description: The literature suggests that COVID-19 vaccines probably don't prevent symptoms or death, but more research is needed

towards_yes.description: The literature suggests that COVID-19 vaccines likely prevent symptoms or death, but more research is needed

yes.description: The literature suggests that COVID-19 vaccines prevent symptoms or death

no.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of the COVID-19 vaccines evaluated on symptoms or death

no_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of the COVID-19 vaccines evaluated on symptoms or death, unlike what is reported in the literature

no_but_mixed_results.description: The results of the paper show no significant overall effect of the COVID-19 vaccines evaluated on symptoms or death, but there are mixed results in specific cases

maybe.description: The results of the paper suggest that the COVID-19 vaccines evaluated might have an effect on symptoms or death, but the evidence is not strong enough to conclude

yes_but_low_confidence.description: The results of the paper suggest that the COVID-19 vaccines evaluated may prevent symptoms or death, but the evidence is not strong

yes_but_small_effect.description: The results of the paper suggest that the COVID-19 vaccines evaluated may have a small effect on symptoms or death

yes_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper suggest that the COVID-19 vaccines evaluated may prevent symptoms or death, unlike what is reported in the literature

yes.description: The results of the paper suggest that the COVID-19 vaccines evaluated prevent symptoms or death
